def maximize_joy(C, H_r, H_b, W_r, W_b):
    result = 1
    if W_r * W_r >= C:
        i = 0
        while W_r * i <= C:
            j = (C - W_r * i) // W_b
            result = max(result, H_r * i + H_b * j)
            i += 1
        return result
    if W_b * W_b >= C:
        i = 0
        while W_b * i <= C:
            j = (C - W_b * i) // W_r
            result = max(result, H_b * i + H_r * j)
            i += 1
        return result
    joy_per_gram_r = H_r / W_r
    joy_per_gram_b = H_b / W_b
    if joy_per_gram_b < joy_per_gram_r:
        i = 0
        while i * i <= C:
            j = (C - W_b * i) // W_r
            result = max(result, H_b * i + H_r * j)
            i += 1
    else:
        i = 0
        while i * i <= C:
            j = (C - W_r * i) // W_b
            result = max(result, H_r * i + H_b * j)
            i += 1
    return result
